recipes.name: Budget Tracker
recipes.author: SheetLink
recipes.description: Track spending vs budget by category with multi-month trending
recipes.longDescription: Monitor your spending against budgets across multiple months. Automatically calculates actuals from your transaction data, compares to budget targets, and shows variance. Perfect for personal budgeting and expense tracking.

recipes.name: Budget Tracker (by Account)
recipes.author: SheetLink
recipes.description: Track spending by category broken down by account
recipes.longDescription: Extended budget tracker that shows spending by category with a breakdown by account. See which accounts drive spending in each category. Includes multi-month trending and variance analysis.

recipes.name: Recurring Spend Detector
recipes.author: SheetLink
recipes.description: Identify subscriptions and recurring charges with trends
recipes.longDescription: Automatically detects recurring transactions like subscriptions, memberships, and regular bills. Shows frequency, average amount, total spent, and annualized cost. Includes monthly trending to see how recurring spend changes over time.

recipes.name: Cash Flow Forecast
recipes.author: SheetLink
recipes.description: Weekly cash flow projection with income, expenses, and running balance
recipes.longDescription: See your cash flow week by week with income, expenses, net change, and projected ending balance. Configurable starting balance. Perfect for understanding your financial runway and cash position over time.

recipes.name: Financial Statements Suite
recipes.author: Rudy
recipes.description: Complete financial reporting: Chart of Accounts, General Ledger, P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow Statement
recipes.longDescription: Professional-grade financial reporting suite. Includes: Chart of Accounts with customizable GL codes, General Ledger with debit/credit entries and running balances, and consolidated Financial Statements (Income Statement, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow Statement) with monthly trending. Perfect for small businesses, freelancers, and power users who need GAAP-style reporting.
